Topic Summary: Whether certain loan notes disposed of by the Appellant constitute a “debt on security” within the meaning of Section 541 TCA 1997 and as such, whether the Appellant was entitled to claim loss relief on their disposal.
Tax Legislation: Section 541 (1), Section 546, Section 585, Section 607, Section 739B & Section 959Z of the Taxes Consolidation Act, 1997 ("TCA 1997")
